content.title: Proteus Syndrome
content.description: Rare overgrowth disorder with progressive, asymmetric overgrowth and vascular malformations caused by somatic AKT1 mutations.

clinical_features.progressive_nature: Normal at birth, progressive asymmetric overgrowth

vascular_complications.dvt_risk: Increased risk of deep vein thrombosis

content.clinical_pearl: Progressive nature distinguishes from CLOVES; high DVT risk warrants prophylaxis consideration
